description: NEUTROGENA® Clear Face Liquid Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 55 is sun protection that leaves your skin healthy and clear. For face and body, it helps prevent sunburn without causing breakouts on acne-prone skin. The liquid-lotion has a water-light texture that leaves a weightless, matte finish so skin can breathe. This sunscreen is formulated with clinically-proven HELIOPLEX®, an advanced sunscreen technology with superior broad-spectrum protection from skin-aging UVA rays and skin-burning UVB rays. This dermatologist-tested formula is fragrance free and non-comedogenic, so it won’t clog pores or cause breakouts. It is water-resistant up to 80 minutes.

For use on the face and ideal for vigorous activity, this sunscreen resists wear off from water, rubbing, sweating, or wiping. This sunscreen has been formulated with clinically-proven HELIOPLEX®, an advanced sunscreen technology with superior broad-spectrum protection from skin-aging UVA rays and skin-burning UVB rays. An electrolyte complex helps nourish and restore skin balance. When used as directed with other sun protection measures, this product can help decrease the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun. description: Designed for daily use, Sun Bum Face Lotion SPF 50 is a weightless lotion that quickly absorbs into your skin for easy, invisible protection with a matte finish. Made for the face but works everywhere you want a super sheer look and feel without compromising our strong and trusted coverage. Sun Bum Face Lotion SPF 50 will protect you from harmful UVA/UVB rays while enriching your skin with vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps to neutralize free radicals, which are the main cause of premature skin aging. Sun Bum sunscreens are tested, approved, and recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation (SCF). The SCF is internationally recognized as the educational leader to the public and medical communities related to skin cancer prevention. The SCF does not approve or lend its seal of approval to higher risk products that do not meet their stringent standards.

description: SPF 50 Mineral Face StickClear/ tint free formulaSun care + Skincare100% vegan and cruelty-freeWhat it is: A innovative SPF 50 Face Stick that integrates sun care into sun care with beneficials including probiotics and caffeine. Goes on smoothly so it doesn't tug too hard and pull on your delicate areas. Scented with natural coconut for a true beach vibe- no matter where your adventures may happen. Created by and for surfers (and all their friends who love to play and be in the sun and salt water).What else you should know: Remember, your sunscreen only works if you use it correctly! SPF numbers are determined in a lab. In the real world, no matter what the SPF, sunscreens start to lose effectiveness over time (2 hours max). So it's important to reapply every two hours or less and after swimming or heavy sweating. The most important factor is that you need to use enough sunscreen for adequate protection. And while our sunscreens apply evenly and can have a more translucent look, they work as a block and you need to cover your skin completely for effective results. What else you should know: Every true beauty knows it's what's on the inside that matters.Formulated without petroleum, parabens, silicones, retinyl palmitate, phthalates & chemical UV absorbers.Directions. Sun damage is serious and sunscreens are only effective if you use them properly! Sun protection measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer & early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher & other sun protection measures including: Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 am - 2 pm. Wear long-sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses when in the sun.WarningsFor external use only. Do not use:On damaged or broken skin. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. When using this product, keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Can stain clothing. Keep away from clothes.Sun protection measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer & early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher & other sun protection measures.

*Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: 1) Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. and 2) Wear long-sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses
